metadata.description: Visual sensory reflex pathways aligning focus, pupil size, and eye tracking.
metadata.notes: Visual reflex documentation only; excludes detailed biomimetic phototransduction parameters.

accommodation.stimulus: Blur detection from retinal image defocus.
accommodation.afferent: Retinal ganglion relay through lateral geniculate to visual cortex.
accommodation.efferent: Parasympathetic fibers via CN III to ciliary muscle.
accommodation.effector: Lens curvature increase enhancing near focus.

light_response.stimulus: Overall luminance increase within central visual field.
light_response.afferent: Intrinsic photosensitive retinal ganglion cells to pretectal area.
light_response.integration: Bilateral Edinger-Westphal nuclei distributing constrictor drive.

optokinetic_nystagmus.afferent: Retinal slip signals via accessory optic system.
optokinetic_nystagmus.integration: Brainstem optokinetic nuclei linking to vestibular and ocular motor centers.
optokinetic_nystagmus.efferent: Ocular motor nuclei orchestrating slow pursuit and quick reset phases.
optokinetic_nystagmus.effector: Alternating slow tracking and rapid saccades stabilizing visual scene.
